body_html:
If this is an ABI issue, then the following should help:

https://www.python.org/dev/peps/pep-0513/ # recently accepted spec for glibc based binary wheels for debian, ubuntu, redhat, centos, arch linux...

https://github.com/pypa/manylinux # tooling based on docker + centos 5 for building wheels

https://github.com/pypa/auditwheel # tooling to check and fix manylinux compatible wheels
body_text:
If this is an ABI issue, then the following should help:
https://www.python.org/dev/peps/pep-0513/  # recently accepted spec for glibc based binary wheels for debian, ubuntu, redhat, centos, arch linux...
https://github.com/pypa/manylinux  # tooling based on docker + centos 5 for building wheels
https://github.com/pypa/auditwheel  # tooling to check and fix manylinux compatible wheels
body:
If this is an ABI issue, then the following should help:

https://www.python.org/dev/peps/pep-0513/  # recently accepted spec for glibc based binary wheels for debian, ubuntu, redhat, centos, arch linux...

https://github.com/pypa/manylinux  # tooling based on docker + centos 5 for building wheels

https://github.com/pypa/auditwheel  # tooling to check and fix manylinux compatible wheels
